mapper.select: select pid,pname,show_type,term from col_plate where cid=#{cid}
select distinct indi_id,indi_name from correlative_indi where cid=#{cid}

select indi_code,indi_name,date_code,freq_code,time_point,indi_value,unitname,group1_name from indi_all where indi_code=#{indi_code} and date_code>=#{startTime} and date_code<=#{endTime} and time_point=#{time_point} and freq_code=#{freq_code} order by date_code
select date_code from indi_all where freq_code=#{freq_code} and indi_code=#{indi_code} and time_point=#{time_point} and sjly=#{sjly} order by date_code desc limit 0,#{term}
select distinct freq_code from indi_all where indi_code=#{indi_code}
select distinct SHOW_TYPE from index_manage where INDI_CODE=#{indi_code}
select date_code from indi_all where freq_code=#{freq_code} and indi_code=#{indi_code} and date_code>=#{startTime} and date_code<=#{endTime} and time_point=#{time_point} order by date_code
